system.description: Name somebody who might conceivably eat, drink, or otherwise ingest something you’ve touched. If it’s an NPC, roll+hard; a PC, roll+Hx.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, some several people of the MC’s choice, maybe including your guy maybe not, get it, and all suffer 3-harm (ap).

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a 7-9, they do, and suffer 2-harm (ap) sometime during the next 24 hours.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, they do, and suffer 4-harm (ap) sometime during the next 24 hours.
